attributes.action: Say NO! to plans to cut service Family accomadation entitlement to 8yrs/10 years serivce,
attributes.additional_details:
Say no to these plans.
Married service personal living in serivce accommodation could be forced to leave their homes if proposals being considered to reduce services housing are adopted.

The move, being considered by the MoD, would force thousands of serving Armed Forces personnel onto the commercial property market.
It would mean soldiers no longer have the right to a ...home after eight years of service and is part a plan to reduce Services accommodation under a 'New Employment Model

armed forces get ripped off, underpaid, treated like worthless dirt, work away from your wives husbands and children for 6 or more months at a time and to top it all off you will have no where to live after giving them 8 years of your life to the serivce , all we ask for is  accomadation for the families for the hole term off the serivce being done so we can live as a family.
